data.actual_result: No formatting is applied and you see a bunch of backticks followed by your code block's text followed by some more backticks.
data.expected_result: The stuff in the code block should be formatted as a code block
data.short_description: Code blocks containing an empty line with text before and after them don't format properly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type (or have someone else type) a code block that has text before it, after it, and an empty line inside of it. A simple one is a``````a. - View it on iOS discord.
